name: Telesat Corporation Common and Variable Voting Shares
longDescription: Telesat Corp is a global satellite operator, providing its customers with mission-critical communications services. The company's segment includes Broadcast; Enterprise and Consulting and other. It generates maximum revenue from the Broadcast segment. The Broadcast segment includes Direct-to-home television, video distribution and contribution, and occasional use services. Geographically, it derives a majority of revenue from Canada.
